duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and maintain all documentation related to the development, design, and production of medical devices.
Create and update documents such as design control plans, design history files, and standard operating procedures.
Ensure that all documentation is accurate, up-to-date, and in compliance with regulatory requirements.
Implement and maintain document control systems.
Train employees on document control procedures.
Conduct audits to ensure compliance with internal and external regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Health Information Management or related field (Master's preferred)
